Articles.Content:
I was looking at some stuff online (a stock missile launcher battle) and was curious in making the launcher itself a bit more dynamic. I adapted one of Majorjims/klonds rcs ball and thermometer hinges to make a hinge for a landing leg or gear to push on and strapped a rocket based cruise missile (really a small rocket powered airplane) and built a rover for it (with some plating) so that everything is in a nice package.

Probably nothing new, but it was a nice entry into the mechanical things I have seen on the forums (so fiddly, so weird. KSP doesn't seem to like this). Download is on KerbalX (for those interested).
I love the look of this mate! And the idea of way it opens too. I think this would be great for stock battles. Have you posted it on the stock weapons thread?

4 hours ago, Majorjim! said:

I love the look of this mate! And the idea of way it opens too. I think this would be great for stock battles. Have you posted it on the stock weapons thread?

No, I have not seen a thread like that. I'll do that now. Also thanks!

Edited April 8, 2017 by qzgy
